attributes.action: Indict Tony Blair for war crimes under UK law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are existing UK laws former Prime Minister Blair can be indicted under. There is no question that he broke the law when he:

1. knowingly gave false intelligence to Parliament to make the case for war

2. invaded a country that did not pose a national security threat to the UK or her allies

3. authorized the intelligence services to take prisoners to countries where they knew they would be tortured

4. allowed the United States to use airbases on UK soil during the transport of prisoners to secret prisons where torture was used

rejection.details: Suspected crimes are a matter for the police and the CPS.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
